entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 12:00 PM PST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers changing to rain showers near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
